name: A Murder Most Wicked
description: You play as Private Investigator Briar Vass, who specialises in the dark and morbid facets of detective work, that has been called to the scene of a grisly murder with no sign of the killer. You must search for clues throughout the house and talk to members of the household in order figure out who the killer is. Once you’ve cleared your way through the three levels of the house and discovered all the clues, you must identify the true killer in order to win the game.
